title: Ticket #4078: job_core_niceuser_van fails to use PID-ified output file names
description:
It's clear from the code that the test job_core_niceuser_van is trying to have output written to files like job_core_niceuser_van.$PID.log. But ultimately it submits job_core_niceuser_van.cmd, which just dumps it into job_core_niceuser_van.log

The code trying to use the PID should be removed or fixed.
creator: adesmet
